trait.name: Size
trait.text: Warforged (UA) are generally broader and heavier than humans. Your size is Medium

trait.name: Composite Plating
trait.text: Your construction incorporates wood and metal, granting you a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

trait.name: Living Construct
trait.text:
Even though you were constructed, you are a living creature. You are immune to disease. You do not need to eat or breathe, but you can ingest food and drink if you wish.
Instead of sleeping, you enter an inactive state for 4 hours each day. You do not dream in this state; you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.
